The bathroom is represented by the node "bathroom", which also contains a white-tiled floor (represented by the node "floor"), a sink (represented by the node "sink"), a shelf (represented by the node "shelf"), and medicine (represented by the node "medicine"). Finally, there is a collection of toothbrushes represented by the node "toothbrushes".

This sheep is white and tan and has an expression of nonchalance, an eye, and a nose. Among the sheep are some that have markings of blue paint, which are spots and splashes. In the second scene, there is a glass window placed on top of a clock, and another glass window placed on top of a different clock. 

In the third scene, there are three glass windows without clocks, one with a carved frame, and a pillar placed on top of a tower. 

In the fourth scene, there is an arched, stone doorway placed on top of a tower, as well as five red brick blocks and orange lights. Inside the tower, there is a clock with multiple windows in it, as well as a clocktower. 

Finally, in the fifth and last scene, there is a gigantic clock with a roman numeral display on it, placed on top of a clocktower. There is also a sculpture on top of the clocktower, and a balcony with a window overlooking the scene.
